original_text: Jesus answered, Thou couldest have no power at all against me, except it were given thee from above: therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin.
korean_text: 예수께서 대답하시되 위에서 주지 아니하셨더라면 나를 해할 권한이 없었으리니 그러므로 나를 네게 넘겨 준 자의 죄는 더 크다 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Thou couldest have no power at all against me
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 나를 대적할 아무 권세도 없을 것이다

sentences.original_text: except it were given thee from above
he that delivered me unto thee
